setState

public void setState(ProcessState state)
Description copied from interface: Process
Sets the current ProcessState. The state should be set to ProcessState.Created by Engine.newProcess(Graph). It should then be set to ProcessState.Executing by Engine.startProcess(Process).

Specified by:
setState in interface Process
Parameters:
state - The new ProcessState

hasActiveTokens

public boolean hasActiveTokens()
Description copied from interface: Process
Return true if the process has any active arc or node tokens. A process with no active tokens should be marked pending complete.

Specified by:
hasActiveTokens in interface Process
Returns:
True if the process has active tokens, false otherwise.
